titleStmt.title: The Narrative of the proceedings at the Sessions for London and Middlesex begun at the Old-Bailey on Wednesday the 10th of December, 1679 : giving an account of all the material tryals there &c. : with the number and names of the several persons comdemn'd to die and their particular crimes : as also how many burnt in the hand &c.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Quarter Sessions of the Peace (London)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
